amendment.description: To specify requirements under the Arms Export Control Act applicable to the VHXX Executive Helicopter Program (also known as the Marine One Presidential Helicopter Program).

vote.text: Amendment SA 318 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 318 proposed by Senator Dodd. (consideration: CR S3255-3257; text: CR S3255) To specify requirements under the Arms Export Control Act applicable to the VHXX Executive Helicopter Program (also known as the Marine One Presidential Helicopter Program).
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 318 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 318 proposed by Senator Dodd.
